addCollateralAsset(address,address,uint2.details: Only callable by the owner and cannot be called more than once for an asset.

params._anchor: Underlying anchor for a krAsset collateral, needs to support IKreskoAssetAnchor.
params._collateralAsset: The address of the collateral asset.
params._factor: The collateral factor of the collateral asset as a raw value for a FixedPoint.Unsigned. Must be <= 1e18.
params._marketStatusOracle: The oracle address for the collateral asset's market open/closed status
params._priceFeedOracle: The oracle address for the collateral asset's USD value.

params._anchor: Underlying anchor for the krAsset, needs to support IKreskoAssetAnchor.
params._closeFee: The initial close fee percentage for the Kresko asset.
params._kFactor: The k-factor of the Kresko asset as a raw value for a FixedPoint.Unsigned. Must be >= 1e18.
params._krAsset: The address of the wrapped Kresko asset, needs to support IKreskoAsset.
params._marketStatusOracle: The oracle address for the Kresko asset market status.
params._openFee: The initial open fee percentage for the Kresko asset.
params._priceFeedOracle: The oracle address for the Kresko asset.
params._supplyLimit: The initial total supply limit for the Kresko asset.

params._anchor: Underlying anchor for a krAsset collateral, needs to support IKreskoAssetAnchor.
params._collateralAsset: The address of the collateral asset.
params._factor: The new collateral factor as a raw value for a FixedPoint.Unsigned. Must be <= 1e18.
params._marketStatusOracle: The oracle address for the collateral asset's market open/closed status
params._priceFeedOracle: The new oracle address for the collateral asset.

params._closeFee: The new close fee percentage for the Kresko asset.
params._kFactor: The new k-factor as a raw value for a FixedPoint.Unsigned. Must be >= 1e18.
params._krAsset: The address of the Kresko asset.
params._marketStatusOracle: The oracle address for the Kresko asset market status.
params._openFee: The new open fee percentage for the Kresko asset.
params._priceFeedOracle: The new oracle address for the Kresko asset's USD value.
params._supplyLimit: The new total supply limit for the Kresko asset.

updateLiquidationThreshold(uint256).details: Updates the contract's liquidation threshold value

params._minimumCollateralizationRatio: The new minimum collateralization ratio as a raw value for a FixedPoint.Unsigned.

updateMinimumDebtValue(uint256).details: Updates the contract's minimum debt value.

params._minimumDebtValue: The new minimum debt value as a raw value for a FixedPoint.Unsigned.

addCollateralAsset(address,address,uint2.notice: Adds a collateral asset to the protocol.

addKreskoAsset(address,address,uint256,a.notice: Adds a Kresko asset to the protocol.

updateAMMOracle(address).notice: Sets the protocol AMM oracle address

updateCollateralAsset(address,address,ui.notice: Updates a previously added collateral asset.

updateExtOracleDecimals(uint8).notice: Sets the decimal precision of external oracle

updateKreskoAsset(address,address,uint25.notice: Updates the k-factor of a previously added Kresko asset.

userdoc.notice: Functionality for `Role.OPERATOR` level actions.Can be only initialized by the `Role.ADMIN`
